data.comment: Leandro Fernandez (Internacional) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started at Neo Quimica Arena.
Edenilson of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 1, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 4, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 6, Romulo Otero for Corinthians gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Corinthians's Ramiro is whistled for offside at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior blows against Corinthians's Davo for offside.
In the minute 10, Internacional are pushing forward but Edenilson's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 14, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Corinthians.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 17, Ramiro (Corinthians) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Corinthians.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 21, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 24, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Internacional throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Free kick Corinthians.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Heitor (Internacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corinthians's Davo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Corinthians.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Davo.
Great play from Juan Cazares to set up the goal.
In the minute 36, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 40, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Internacional.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Internacional to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Corinthians needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Internacional.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Internacional's Ze Gabriel looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Gil (Corinthians) has received a yellow card from Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Attention is being given to Internacionalâ€™s Ze Gabriel and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Internacional throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Internacional at Neo Quimica Arena.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cassio.
Corinthians's Cassio is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 50, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 52, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 53, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Internacional.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 56, Corinthians's Ramiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Internacional at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corinthians's Romulo Otero has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Internacional's half.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 60, Abel Hernandez for the away team is judged to be offside.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 61, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Internacional.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Internacional.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 64, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
The away team have replaced Marcos Guilherme with Andres D'Alessandro. This is the first substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 65, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Victor Cuesta is booked for the away team.
In the minute 67, Leo Natel is replacing Davo for the home team.
Corinthians drives forward and Romulo Otero gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 68, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 71, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
At Neo Quimica Arena, Juan Cazares has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Juan Cazares with Luan.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Internacional's area.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, The match at Neo Quimica Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marcelo Lomba, who is down injured.
Internacional make their second substitution with Johnny replacing Uendel.
Nonato is on a sub for Heitor for Internacional.
In the minute 81, Internacional's Edenilson breaks free at Neo Quimica Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Marcelo Lomba is back on the pitch.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Internacional.
Free kick Internacional.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Corinthians.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 86, Internacional drive forward but Patrick is judged offside.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
The home team replace Ederson with Guilherme Camacho.
In the minute 88, Vagner Mancini (Corinthians) is making a fourth substitution, with Gabriel replacing Ramiro.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
At Neo Quimica Arena the fourth official shows that 8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Internacional are coming forward and Edenilson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Guilherme Camacho for Corinthians is back on the field again.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Internacional.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 9 minutes of added time.
Free kick in a good position for Corinthians!
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Guilherme Camacho for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Eduardo Coudet is making the team's fourth substitution at Neo Quimica Arena with Yuri Alberto replacing Ze Gabriel.
Internacional's Edenilson has been booked in Sao Paulo and will miss the next match through suspension.
Internacional are down to 10 men after Thiago Galhardo has been shown a red card.
